name: Beavis and Butt-Head in Little Thingies
name_original: Beavis and Butt-Head in Little Thingies
description:
Beavis and Butt-Head in Little Thingies is a game.
You can play Beavis and Butt-Head in Little Thingies on PC.
John Andrews, Michael Blakey, Rhonda Cox and Susie Lewis produced the game. Mike Judge and Yvette Kaplan directed the game. Mike Judge scored the game.
